Project: Design a Self-Driving Electric Vehicle (EV) System for Urban Areas

By: Jackson, Matt, Emily, David

STEM: Science, technology, engineering, and mathematics

Application of AI and autonomous driving technology.
Development of efficient electric vehicle systems and sustainable charging infrastructure.
Mathematical modeling for route optimization and energy management.

Social Outcomes

Provides accessible and convenient transportation, reducing the need for personal cars.
Promotes sustainability through the use of electric power and renewable energy sources.
Improves urban living by reducing traffic congestion and pollution.
